name: Corona Battleground
description:
Corona Battleground is action platformer game up to 4 players, where players are spawned in a battlefield map to kill each other. Choose between 4 quarantined characters and win against each other. Enjoy intense versus battles against your enemies.

Created during quarantine. Stay safe and defeat COVID-19.

Key features:

  • 2-4 player battle with 2 games modes
  • Last Man Standing
  • Timed Death-match
  • 10 maps
  • AI can be added

Note:

You can pause the game using esc.

You are invincible while dashing.

There may be errors in playing on browser. You can just download the game.
